page.title: 20A new flyover at Hanford.
page.content: My school is on the busy Hanford Roundabout and every morning the traffic on the link road from the M6 is held up.They have decided to build a flyover but this will effect our school.First we will lose half our Football pitch next to the school.The Traffic will be much closer making it noisier with more vibrations from the heavy lorries that travel from the M6 to the city centre.Some tall trees will have to be knocked down which look pretty and sheild us from the noise and the traffic.I think the view will be spoiled and distract us.We will see the traffic going by our school along the flover.
